modShortDescription: Lots of useless steel parts not worth selling? Then just use them to get some steel for something more useful.
modDescription:
Lots of useless steel parts not worth selling? Then just use them to get some steel for something more useful.

## What This Mod Does

* New category in Forge “Steel”
* Parts can be recrafted info Steelscrap/Ironscrap (depends on type)  
   * Steelscrap can be melted in forge
* Iron and Steel [arrows](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-ammo/) can be recrafted into arrowheads
* Parts craftable in forge (separated version)
* Crafrable Beaker

## Changelog

* **v1.0.1:** Fixed scrapping of steel items
* **v1.0.0:** Created

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Cronosus/7dtd/tree/main/Steel)** Crafftable Parts  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Cronosus/7dtd/tree/main/SteelNP)** Parts Not Craftable

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/27853-cronosuss-mods-~a17-a20/).
